testcase.classname: User should be able to register successfully using required fields
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to register page.......................................passed When user enter Fisrtname, lastname, email and password.....................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then user could register successfully.......................................passed And go to registeration result page.........................................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to login successfully
testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enter valid email and password....................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user could login successfully and go to home page......................passed
